overview.role_description: Lingyang is a Glacio main DPS who excels in aerial combat and Basic Attack DMG output. Easy to pick up, with high burst potential.
overview.synopsis:
Core Mechanics: Lion's Spirit. When Lingyang has max [Lion's Spirit], using Heavy Attack, [Intro Skill + Basic Attack], or [Resonance Liberation + Basic Attack] will trigger [Striding Lion], a burst state. When [Lion's Spirit] is less than 10, use Basic Attack to perform [Stormy Kicks]. Afterward, the [Mid-air Attack Tail Strike] becomes available.
[Lion's Spirit] Gain: Triggered by enhanced Resonance Skill after the 3rd/4th/5th Basic Attack hit. Using Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation. Max: 100.
Using Resonance Liberation puts Lingyang into [Lion's Vigor] state, increasing his Glacio DMG by 50% and reducing [Lionâ€™s Spirit] consumption by 50%.
Rotation: Intro Skill + AAA-E-A-E-R-H- (A-E)*5-AAA
overview.rotation:
Team Comp Analysis: Lingyang is a pure Glacio DPS who excels with teammates that buff his Basic Attack DMG or Glacio DMG.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.

texts.name: Abyss Surges
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%), lasting for (8/8/8/8/8)s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%), lasting for (8/8/8/8/8)s.

texts.name: Stonard
texts.effectDescription: Casting Resonance Skill increases the wielder's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by (18%/27%/36%/45%/54%), lasting for (15/15/15/15/15)s.

texts.name: Celestial Spiral
texts.effectDescription: Casting the Resonance Skill grants (6/7/8/9/10) Resonance Energy and increases ATK by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%), lasting for (16/16/16/16/16)s. This effect can be triggered once every (20/20/20/20/20)s.

texts.name: Lampylumen Myriad
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Lampylumen Myriad. Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks.



Unleash a freezing shock by performing consecutive forward strikes, with the initial two strikes inflicting 200.16% and 200.16% Glacio DMG respectively, and the final strike dealing 266.88% Glacio DMG. Enemies will be frozen on hit.



Each shock increases the current character's Glacio DMG by 4.00% and Resonance Skill DMG dealt by 4.00% for 15s, stacking up to 3 times



CD: 20s

texts.name: Freezing Frost
texts.description: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.

texts.name: Freezing Frost
texts.description: Glacio DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Lampylumen Myriad
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Lampylumen Myriad. Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks.



Unleash a freezing shock by performing consecutive forward strikes, with the initial two strikes inflicting 200.16% and 200.16% Glacio DMG respectively, and the final strike dealing 266.88% Glacio DMG. Enemies will be frozen on hit.



Each shock increases the current character's Glacio DMG by 4.00% and Resonance Skill DMG dealt by 4.00% for 15s, stacking up to 3 times



CD: 20s

texts.name: Lingering Tunes
texts.description: ATK +10%

texts.name: Freezing Frost
texts.description: Glacio DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Emerald of Genesis
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by (6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) time(s). This effect lasts for (10/10/10/10/10)s.

texts.name: Impermanence Heron
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Impermanence Heron to fly up and smack down, dealing 310.56% Havoc DMG.



Long press to stay as Impermanence Heron and continuously spit flames, each attack dealing 55.73% Havoc DMG.



Once the initial attack lands on any enemy, the current character regains 10 Resonance Energy. If the current character uses their Outro Skill within the next 15s, the next character's damage dealt will be boosted by 12% for 15s.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Lion's Pride
texts.description: DMG of the Intro Skill Lion Awakens is increased by 50%.

texts.name: Diligent Practice
texts.description: Under the Forte Circuit Striding Lion state, within 3s after each Basic Attack, the next Forte Circuit Mountain Roamer will deal an additional Glacio DMG, equal to 150% of Mountain Roamer DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.

texts.name: Frosty Marks
texts.description: Lingyang releases a shock wave centered on the skill target, dealing Glacio DMG equal to 5.8794 of Lingyang's ATK to targets within the range.

texts.name: Majestic Fists
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Lingyang performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.



Basic Attack: Feral Roars

After Resonance Skill Furious Punches is cast, Basic Attack 5 is replaced with Feral Roars, dealing Glacio DMG.



Heavy Attack

Lingyang consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Lingyang consumes STA to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.



Dodge Counter

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

texts.name: Ancient Arts
texts.description:
Ancient Arts

Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.



Furious Punches

When Basic Attacks 3, 4, or 5 or Basic Attack Feral Roars hits the target, Resonance Skill Ancient Arts is replaced with Resonance Skill Furious Punches.

Lingyang's Basic Attack cycle starts from Basic Attack 3 after casting Basic Attack Feral Roars and Resonance Skill Furious Punches in turn.



Lingyang's Resonance Skill does not reset his Basic Attack cycle.

texts.name: Unification of Spirits
texts.description:
Heavy Attack: Glorious Plunge

When "Lion's Spirit" is full, use Heavy Attack to perform Glorious Plunge, dealing Glacio DMG.



Mid-air Attack: Tail Strike

When "Lion's Spirit" is not full, use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack to perform Tail Strike, dealing Glacio DMG.



Striding Lion

After casting Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge, enter Striding Lion state;

After casting Intro Skill Lion Awakens or Resonance Liberation Strive: Lion's Vigor, if "Lion's Spirit" is full, use Basic Attack to enter Striding Lion state.

In the Striding Lion state:

-Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge to get back in the air.

-"Lion's Spirit" is continuously consumed before running out in 5s, and when it runs out, Striding Lion ends;

-If Lingyang is in the Resonance Liberation Lion's Vigor state, the consumption speed of "Lion's Spirit" is reduced by 50%, extending Striding Lion state by up to 10s.

-Lingyang's Basic Attack is replaced with Basic Attack Feral Gyrate, which performs up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG;

-Lingyang's Resonance Skill is replaced with Mountain Roamer, dealing Glacio DMG;

-When "Lion's Spirit" is less than 10, use Basic Attack to perform Stormy Kicks, dealing Glacio DMG; after performing Basic Attack Stormy Kicks, the Mid-air Attack Tail Strike becomes available.

-Concerto Energy is restored when "Lion's Spirit" is consumed.



Lion's Spirit

Lingyang can hold up to 100 "Lion's Spirit".

When casting Resonance Skill Furious Punches, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

When casting Intro Skill Lion Awakens, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

When casting Resonance Liberation Strive: Lion's Vigor, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

texts.name: Strive: Lion's Vigor
texts.description:
Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG, and receive the blessing of Lion's Vigor.



Lion's Vigor

Lingyang gains 0.5 Glacio DMG Bonus.

texts.name: Lion Awakens
texts.description: Lingyang enters the battlefield, dealing Glacio DMG.

In the Striding Lion state:

-Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge to get back in the air.

-Lingyang's Basic Attack is replaced with Basic Attack Feral Gyrate, which performs up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG;

-Concerto Energy is restored when "Lion's Spirit" is consumed.



Lion's Spirit

When casting Resonance Skill Furious Punches, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

When casting Intro Skill Lion Awakens, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.

texts.name: Strive: Lion's Vigor
texts.description:

Lion's Vigor

texts.name: Lion Awakens
texts.description: Lingyang enters the battlefield, dealing Glacio DMG.

texts.name: Lion of Light, Blessings Abound
texts.description: During Resonance Liberation Lion's Vigor, Lingyang's Anti-Interruption is enhanced.

texts.name:
Dominant and Fierce, 

Power Unbound
texts.description: Intro Skill Lion Awakens additionally recovers 10 Resonance Energy for Lingyang, triggered once every 20s.

texts.name:
Jaw-Dropping Feats, 

Loud and Wide
texts.description: During Resonance Liberation Lion's Vigor, Lingyang's Basic Attack DMG Bonus is increased by 20%, and Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increased by 10%.

texts.name:
Immortals Bow, 

in Reverence Flawed
texts.description: Outro Skill Frosty Marks increases the Glacio DMG Bonus of all team members by 20% for 30s.

texts.name:
Seven Stars Shine, 

Stepped upon High
texts.description: Resonance Liberation Strive: Lion's Vigor additionally deals Glacio DMG equal to 200% of Lingyang's ATK.

texts.name:
Demons Tremble, 

Divine Power Nigh
texts.description: In the Forte Circuit Striding Lion state, during the first 3s after every Resonance Skill Mountain Roamer, the Basic Attack DMG Bonus for Lingyang's next Basic Attack is increased by 100%.
